body:
I had originally wanted a default-ish pack for playing Avi but I couldn't really find one I really liked. I decided to just compile all my favourite textures into one and I didn't really care what it would look like. My intentions were to keep it private but I decided I might aswell release it, who knows, maybe someone will like it. I did some tweaking so hopefully it doesn't look too all over the place and looks half decent..

https://youtu.be/sN74Si49bHc

Enjoy!
